message.entry: Timeout must be greater than or equal to 5.
Run blelist to search for nearby Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral devices.
Bluetooth Classic devices not detected. Ensure devices are turned on and within range.
Failed to scan nearby Bluetooth Classic devices. Contact Technical Support if issue persists.
No Bluetooth adapter detected. Make sure system has a built-in or external Bluetooth adapter.
No Bluetooth radio detected. Check your Bluetooth adapter or system Bluetooth settings.
System Bluetooth is not turned on.
Unexpected error - Failed to create DeviceWatcher. Contact Technical Support if issue persists.
Unexpected error - Failed to start DeviceWatcher. Contact Technical Support if issue persists.
Unexpected error - Failed to stop DeviceWatcher. Contact Technical Support if issue persists.
Unexpected error - Failed to stop DeviceInquiry. Contact Technical Support if issue persists.
Bluetooth is not turned on or your computer was in sleep mode. Make sure system Bluetooth is turned on.
